body: The reason I'm making this is because I hadn't been on a scrimmage server and I want to know how they work. I know they have to be reserved but who can reserve and yeah I need to know more info on them. Haven't been on the forums for a while so hello.
body_tagged: The reason I'm making this is because I hadn't been on a scrimmage server and I want to know how they work. I know they have to be reserved but who can reserve and yeah I need to know more info on them. Haven't been on the forums for a while so hello.
title: Scrimmage server setups?

replies.body:
You just need to be the leader of a team, then reserve when you wish at https://avicus.net/scrims

Anything else you want to know?
replies.body_tagged:
You just need to be the leader of a team, then reserve when you wish at https://avicus.net/scrims

Anything else you want to know?

replies.body: Not much but I'll let you know. Thanks!
replies.body_tagged: Not much but I'll let you know. Thanks!

replies.body:
Every 2 hours a scrim is organised so that means if a scrim just started at 6.15PM you have to wait for the 8:00PM
You can organise 3 in 12 hours.
replies.body_tagged:
Every 2 hours a scrim is organised so that means if a scrim just started at 6.15PM you have to wait for the 8:00PM
You can organise 3 in 12 hours.

replies.body: Various commands are use to set maps and start matches. You can check these out when you reserve a scrim server!
